page.title: 20Police Cont
page.content: {Q. How do you think policing in the {area will change over the next few {years?} A. It shouldn't change a lot, but in the next year the prison at Full Sutton will be opening and this may increase personnel. Also in the case of prisoners escaping, some form of roadblock would be necessary but this is not expected to be a problem because the building is modern, built with the knowledge of previous problems. However, prisoners families will either move into the area or continually visit, causing an increase in the population and so larger numbers of police will be required. {Q. Out of the crimes committed, what {percentage are solved? } A. The detection rate for the country is 20% to 30%, but so far this year we are averaging 30% to 40%.
